import React from 'react' import cartimg from '../images/item-6.jpg' import cartimg2 from '../images/item-7.jpg' import cartimg3 from '../images/item-8.jpg' import { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { storeRemoveProduct, incrementQuantity, decrementQuantity } from '../state/cartSlice' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router' export default function Cart() { const cartProduct = useSelector((state) => state.cart) let [count, setCount] = useState(0); let navigate = useNavigate() let dispatch = useDispatch(); function handleIncrement(productId) { // alert(productId) dispatch(incrementQuantity(productId)); }; function handleDecrement(productId) { dispatch(decrementQuantity(productId)); }; function HandleBuy() { navigate('./') } return (

₹ {parseInt(eachData.price) * eachData.quantity}
) }) }
